form.attribute.component.option.create.d: A component is shared across types and components, it will be available and accessible everywhere.

form.attribute.media.option.single.descr: Best for avatar, profile picture or cover
form.attribute.text.option.long-text.des: Best for descriptions, biography. Exact search is disabled.
